query.value: InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_SwapFree_bytes' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName) | extend SwapFreeBytes = Val | join kind=inner ( InsightsMetrics | where Namespace == 'prometheus' and Name == 'node_memory_SwapTotal_bytes' | extend Json = parse_json(Tags) | extend hostname = tostring(Json.hostName) | extend SwapTotalBytes = Val) on TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, hostname | extend SwapPctFree = SwapFreeBytes / SwapTotalBytes * 100 | project TimeGenerated, Computer, Origin, AgentId, Type, _ResourceId, hostname, SwapFreeBytes, SwapTotalBytes, SwapPctFree
